prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a handsome man, lean muscular build, long emerald green hair, wide jawline, focused revengeful eyes, mechanical sniper eyepiece, 8k photorealistic image, atmospheric lighting
feature_prompt: detailed leather texture on flight jacket, metallic texture on the sniper eyepiece, individual green hair strands, subtle stubble, battle scars, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, helmet hair, flat lighting, low quality, blurry eyepiece, (bright neon green hair:1.2), soft features, normal eyes, smiling
